scripts.start:react: cd playground/react-app && npm i && npm run start
scripts.start:vue: cd playground/vue-app && npm i && npm run serve
scripts.start:angular: cd playground/angular-app && npm i && npm run start
scripts.build:jquery:unix: sudo webpack --profile --json > ./bundles/jquery/jquery-stats.json --config jquery.webpack.config.js && sudo npm run prepare:tests:jquery
scripts.start:react:unix: cd playground/react-app && sudo npm i && npm run start
scripts.start:vue:unix: cd playground/vue-app && sudo npm i && npm run serve
scripts.start:angular:unix: cd playground/angular-app && sudo npm i && npm run start
scripts.start:react:prod: cd playground/react-app && npm i && CI=false npm run build -- -p && cd build && http-server -c-1 --port 8001
scripts.start:vue:prod: cd playground/vue-app && npm i && CI=false npm run build && cd dist && http-server -c-1 --port 8002
scripts.start:angular:prod: cd playground/angular-app && npm i && npm run build && cd dist/custombundleangular8 && http-server -c-1 --port 4200
